title: Drawing, 1917-4-699, 1853
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on brown paper.
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457e
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at upper and lower center:  Lugt 457e; and again at center: Lugt 457d
description: Horizontal sheet contains at top center a standing sheep, turned toward the left and beside it, at right, is the back part of a standing sheep, shown obliquely and straight.  At upper right is the head of a ram, shown from the front while at center lower left is the face of a sheep's head, shown in profile, and that of another, shown from the front.  Most of the sheet is blank.
